name: Eesti Energia Aktsiaselts
membership: Eesti Energia is a member of Union of the Electricity Industry - Eurelectric, Estonian Eletcricity Industry Association, World Energy Council Estonia, Estonian Chamber of Trade and Commerce and in a number of smaller local industry associations
memberOrga:
The group structure is available at this link
https://www.energia.ee/en/ettevottest/struktuur
goal: Eesti Energia is a state-owned international energy company that operates in the electricity and gas markets of the Baltic countries, Poland, Finland and Sweden and in the international liquid fuels market. We offer energy solutions that include electricity, heat and fuel production, sales and customer service and other energy services. Our unique experience and technology in relation to processing oil shale and energy production are held in high regard around the world.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU energy market regulation and policy initiatives, EU climate policy regulation and policy initiatives.
